name: 3dAFNItoANALYZE
author: AFNI Developers
description: Writes AFNI dataset to ANALYZE 7.5 format .hdr/.img file pairs.

inputs.description: Output ANALYZE file base name (e.g., aname)
inputs.name: Output name

inputs.description: Write all data to one big ANALYZE file pair named aname.hdr/aname.img
inputs.name: 4D flag

inputs.description: Flip the dataset to a different orientation when writing to ANALYZE files (e.g., LPI)
inputs.name: Orientation code

output-files.description: ANALYZE header file for each sub-brick
output-files.name: Output header file

output-files.description: ANALYZE image file for each sub-brick
output-files.name: Output image file

output-files.description: Single ANALYZE header file if using -4D option
output-files.name: Output 4D header file

output-files.description: Single ANALYZE image file if using -4D option
output-files.name: Output 4D image file
